content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">   <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/afsis-modis-collection-leaf-area-index-fpar-2012">     <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="urn:uuid:6f590b14-eecc-430a-914d-9302c818342a"></owl:sameAs>     <dct:description>The Africa Soil Information Service (AfSIS) Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Collection Leaf Area Index (LAI) and Photosynthetically Active Radiation (FPAR) data sets contain rasters with the following calculations: time series average, time series standard deviation, and time series variance for LAI and FPAR. These calculations for surface photosynthesis were performed for the continent of Africa using available observations from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) MODIS MCD43A3 product. The rasters have a 8-day temporal resolution, a spatial resolution of 1,000 meters, and are updated annually by AfSIS using data provided by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LPDAAC) Data Pool.</dct:description>         <dcat:keyword>AfSIS</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Africa Soil</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Agriculture and Food Security</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>FAPAR</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>FPAR</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Leaf Area Index</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>MODIS</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Remote Sensing</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Satellite Imagery</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Vegetation</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>WWHGD</dcat:keyword>     <foaf:homepage rdf:resource="https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/afsis-modis-collection-leaf-area-index-fpar-2012"></foaf:homepage>     <rdfs:label>afsis-modis-collection-leaf-area-index-fpar-2012</rdfs:label>     <dct:identifier>afsis-modis-collection-leaf-area-index-fpar-2012</dct:identifier>     <dct:title>AfSIS MODIS Collection: Leaf Area Index - FPAR, 2012 Release</dct:title>         <dcat:distribution>             <dcat:Distribution>                 <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource="ftp://africagrids.net/1000m/MOD15A2/"></dcat:accessURL>                     <dct:format>                         <dct:IMT>                             <rdf:value>geotiff</rdf:value>                             <rdfs:label>geotiff</rdfs:label>                         </dct:IMT>                     </dct:format>                <dct:title>AfSIS MODIS Collection: Leaf Area Index - FPAR, 2012 Release</dct:title>             </dcat:Distribution>         </dcat:distribution>     <dct:creator>       <rdf:Description>         <foaf:name>Africa Soil Information Service (AfSIS)</foaf:name>         <foaf:mbox rdf:resource="mailto:afsis.info@africasoils.net"></foaf:mbox>       </rdf:Description>     </dct:creator>     <dct:contributor>       <rdf:Description>         <foaf:name>Africa Soil Information Service (AfSIS)</foaf:name>         <foaf:mbox rdf:resource="mailto:afsis.info@africasoils.net"></foaf:mbox>       </rdf:Description>     </dct:contributor>   </dcat:Dataset> </rdf:RDF>
